abstract: Activates this view as the source of a drag and drop operation, allowing to provide optional identifiable payload and specify the namespace of the drag container this view belongs to.

declaration.code: nonisolated func draggable<Item>(_ itemType: Item.Type = Item.self, containerNamespace: Namespace.ID? = nil, _ item: @escaping () -> Item?) -> some View where Item : Transferable, Item : Identifiable, Item.ID : Sendable

overview:
## Return Value

A view that activates this view as the source of a drag and drop operation, beginning with user gesture input.

## Discussion

Applying the `draggable(_:containerNamespace_:)` modifier adds the appropriate gestures for drag and drop to this view.

If the draggable view is enclosed in a container, it participates in container drag-and-drop sessions:

When a drag operation begins, a rendering of this view is generated and used as the preview image.
title: draggable(_:containerNamespace:_:)
